name: North End Grill's Bloody Smoky
description: In addition to vodka, this Mary gets a smoky finish from some Islay-style scotch. North End Grill uses the Laphroaig 10-year.
recipeIngredient: 16 ounces North End Grill Bloody Mary Mix

recipeInstructions.text: Combine bloody mary mix, scotch, and vodka in a pitcher filled with ice. Stir until well chilled. Serve in individual ice-filled glasses, garnished with pickled onions.
